scriptures.content: <woc>"Truly, truly, I say to you, he who does not enter the sheepfold by the door but climbs in by another way, that man is a thief and a robber. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>But he who enters by the door is the shepherd of the sheep. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>To him the gatekeeper opens. The sheep hear his voice, and he calls his own sheep by name and leads them out. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>When he has brought out all his own, he goes before them, and the sheep follow him, for they know his voice. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="y" cid="c43010005.1"/>A stranger they will not follow, but they will flee from him, for they do not know the voice of strangers. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: This figure of speech Jesus <crossref let="z" cid="c43010006.1"/>used with them, but they <crossref let="a" cid="c43010006.2"/>did not understand what he was saying to them.
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: So Jesus again said to them, <woc>"Truly, truly, I say to you, <crossref let="b" cid="c43010007.1"/>I am the door of the sheep. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>All who came before me are thieves and robbers, but the sheep did not listen to them. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>I am the door. If anyone enters by me, <crossref let="c" cid="c43010009.1"/>he will be saved and will go in and out and <crossref let="d" cid="c43010009.2"/>find pasture. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>The thief comes only to steal and <crossref let="e" cid="c43010010.1"/>kill and destroy. I came that they may have life and have it abundantly. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="f" cid="c43010011.1"/>I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd <crossref let="g" cid="c43010011.2"/>lays down his life for the sheep. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>He who is <crossref let="h" cid="c43010012.1"/>a hired hand and not a shepherd, who does not own the sheep, sees the wolf coming and <crossref let="i" cid="c43010012.2"/>leaves the sheep and flees, and the wolf snatches them and <crossref let="j" cid="c43010012.3"/>scatters them. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>He flees because <crossref let="k" cid="c43010013.1"/>he is a hired hand and <crossref let="l" cid="c43010013.2"/>cares nothing for the sheep. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="m" cid="c43010014.1"/>I am the good shepherd. <crossref let="n" cid="c43010014.2"/>I know my own and <crossref let="o" cid="c43010014.3"/>my own know me,</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="p" cid="c43010015.1"/>just as the Father knows me and I know the Father; and <crossref let="q" cid="c43010015.2"/>I lay down my life for the sheep. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc>And <crossref let="r" cid="c43010016.1"/>I have other sheep that are not of this fold. <crossref let="s" cid="c43010016.2"/>I must bring them also, and <crossref let="t" cid="c43010016.3"/>they will listen to my voice. So there will be <crossref let="u" cid="c43010016.4"/>one flock, <crossref let="v" cid="c43010016.5"/>one shepherd. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="w" cid="c43010017.1"/>For this reason the Father loves me, <crossref let="x" cid="c43010017.2"/>because <crossref let="y" cid="c43010017.3"/>I lay down my life that I may take it up again. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="z" cid="c43010018.1"/>No one takes it from me, but <crossref let="y" cid="c43010018.2"/>I lay it down <crossref let="a" cid="c43010018.3"/>of my own accord. I have authority to lay it down, and <crossref let="b" cid="c43010018.4"/>I have authority to take it up again. <crossref let="c" cid="c43010018.5"/>This charge I have received from my Father. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: <crossref let="d" cid="c43010019.1"/>There was again a division among the Jews because of these words.
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: Many of them said, <crossref let="e" cid="c43010020.1"/>"He has a demon, and <crossref let="f" cid="c43010020.2"/>is insane; why listen to him?"
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: Others said, "These are not the words of one who is oppressed by a demon. <crossref let="g" cid="c43010021.1"/>Can a demon open the eyes of the blind?"
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Good Shepherd

scriptures.content: At that time the Feast of Dedication took place at Jerusalem. It was winter,
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: and Jesus was walking in the temple, <crossref let="h" cid="c43010023.1"/>in the colonnade of Solomon.
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: So the Jews gathered around him and said to him, "How long will you keep us in suspense? If you are <crossref let="i" cid="c43010024.1"/>the Christ, <crossref let="j" cid="c43010024.2"/>tell us plainly. "
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: Jesus answered them, <woc>"I told you, and you do not believe. <crossref let="k" cid="c43010025.1"/>The works that I do <crossref let="l" cid="c43010025.2"/>in my Father's name bear witness about me,</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc>but <crossref let="m" cid="c43010026.1"/>you do not believe because you are not part of my flock. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="n" cid="c43010027.1"/>My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="o" cid="c43010028.1"/>I give them eternal life, and <crossref let="p" cid="c43010028.2"/>they will never perish, and <crossref let="q" cid="c43010028.3"/>no one will snatch them out of my hand. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: My Father, who has given them to me,Some manuscripts What my Father has given to me is greater than all, and no one is able to snatch them out of the Father's hand.
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="u" cid="c43010030.1"/>I and the Father are one. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <crossref let="v" cid="c43010031.1"/>The Jews picked up stones again to stone him.
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: Jesus answered them, <woc>"I have shown you many good works from the Father; for which of them are you going to stone me?"</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: The Jews answered him, "It is not for a good work that we are going to stone you but <crossref let="w" cid="c43010033.1"/>for blasphemy, because you, being a man, <crossref let="x" cid="c43010033.2"/>make yourself God. "
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: Jesus answered them, <woc>"Is it not written in <crossref let="y" cid="c43010034.1"/>your Law, <crossref let="z" cid="c43010034.2"/><crossref cid="t43010034.1"/>'I said, you are gods'?</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc>If he called them gods to whom the word of God came - and Scripture cannot be <crossref let="a" cid="c43010035.1"/>broken - </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc>do you say of him whom <crossref let="b" cid="c43010036.1"/>the Father consecrated and <crossref let="c" cid="c43010036.2"/>sent into the world, 'You are blaspheming,' because <crossref let="d" cid="c43010036.3"/>I said, 'I am the Son of God'?</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="e" cid="c43010037.1"/>If I am not doing the works of my Father, then do not believe me;</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <woc>but if I do them, <crossref let="f" cid="c43010038.1"/>even though you do not believe me, believe the works, that you may know and understand that <crossref let="g" cid="c43010038.2"/>the Father is in me and I am in the Father. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: <crossref let="h" cid="c43010039.1"/>Again they sought to arrest him, but he escaped from their hands.
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: He went away again across the Jordan to the place <crossref let="i" cid="c43010040.1"/>where John had been baptizing at first, and there he remained.
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: And many came to him. And they said, "John did no sign, but <crossref let="j" cid="c43010041.1"/>everything that John said about this man was true. "
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

scriptures.content: And <crossref let="k" cid="c43010042.1"/>many believed in him there. <end-chapter/>
scriptures.section_title: I and the Father Are One

n43010029.1.content: Some manuscripts What my Father has given to me
